com.cloudcontrol.doozer4j.support
Class AbstractSynchroneousDoozerClient

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudcontrol.doozer4j.support.AbstractSynchroneousDoozerClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractDoozerClient
public abstract class AbstractSynchroneousDoozerClient
extends Object

This class provides simple doozer IO operations. Note: All IO operations will be processed synchroneously. Asynchroneous operations are not supported yet.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Denis Neuling (dn@cloudcontrol.de)

receive

protected byte[] receive()
                  throws IOException
Note: that method does not allow to receive responses that size is more than 2^31-1 (~2GB) bytes within one connection.

Returns:
bytes the byte decoded response
Throws:
IOException

send

protected Msg.Response.Builder send(Msg.Request.Builder builder)
                             throws DoozerException,
                                    IOException
This will send the request to the concerning doozerd cluster and will receive and encode the response.
For more informations see googles protocolbuffers documentation.

Parameters:
builder -
Returns:
Builder thr builder that holds the response
Throws:
DoozerException
IOException
